item.title: strace with ChatGPT
item.description: Since ChatGPT is the trend of the moment, I had to check it out. There is a lot to say about it in general, but that won’t be the focus of this post. Recently at work, a colleague asked how he could observe what files a process accesses, without modifying the program. Tracing tools like strace are the best answer I know to that question, and they apply to a lot more than observing file system access.
